text:
Hey Andrei,
for generating Dynamic PDF you can use our tools which can help you to generate the Dynamic PDF : <https://pdf-createmate.de/>

Try this plugin to put into chrome extension and click to on this plugin:
<https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/allow-cors-access-control/lhobafahddgcelffkeicbaginigeejlf?hl=en>

and do let me know if you still face issue.
Thanks for the recommendation! I actually managed to create the dynamic PDF on my own, but I appreciate you reaching out.

Hi All, We have HubSpot Deals view loading in an iframe within Twilio Flex for a while but as of Monday it stopped working. Anyone else having similar issue? 

Not working means the view does not load anymore and all users just see a blank white screen.
